t = int(raw_input())
for i in xrange(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    s = set(a)
    ma = 0
    for j in s:
        if ma < a.count(j):
            p = j
            ma = a.count(j)
        elif ma == a.count(j):
            if p > j:
                p = j
                ma = a.count(j)
    print p,ma
